body:
/priority critical-urgent
/priority failing-test
/kind bug
/status approved-for-milestone
@kubernetes/sig-apps-test-failures 

This test has been failing since at least 2017-11-13 in the following jobs:
- https://k8s-testgrid.appspot.com/sig-release-master-upgrade#gce-1.8-master-upgrade-master
- https://k8s-testgrid.appspot.com/sig-release-master-upgrade#gce-1.8-master-upgrade-cluster

These jobs are on the [sig-release-master-upgrade dashboard](https://k8s-testgrid.appspot.com/sig-release-master-upgrade), and prevent us from cutting v1.9.0-beta.1 (kubernetes/sig-release#34). Is there work ongoing to bring this test back to green?

triage cluster [ae1720e299d92ebf1b8f](https://storage.googleapis.com/k8s-gubernator/triage/index.html?test=%5C%5Bk8s%5C.io%5C%5D%5C%20%5C%5Bsig%5C-apps%5C%5D%5C%20Network%5C%20Partition%5C%20%5C%5BDisruptive%5C%5D%5C%20%5C%5BSlow%5C%5D%5C%20%5C%5Bk8s%5C.io%5C%5D%5C%20Pods%5C%20should%5C%20return%5C%20to%5C%20running%5C%20and%5C%20ready%5C%20state%5C%20after%5C%20network%5C%20partition%5C%20is%5C%20healed%5C%20All%5C%20pods%5C%20on%5C%20the%5C%20unreachable%5C%20node%5C%20should%5C%20be%5C%20marked%5C%20as%5C%20NotReady%5C%20upon%5C%20the%5C%20node%5C%20turn%5C%20NotReady%5C%20AND%5C%20all%5C%20pods%5C%20should%5C%20be%5C%20mark%5C%20back%5C%20to%5C%20Ready%5C%20when%5C%20the%5C%20node%5C%20get%5C%20back%5C%20to%5C%20Ready%5C%20before%5C%20pod%5C%20eviction%5C%20timeout#ae1720e299d92ebf1b8f)
```
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/network_partition.go:219
Nov 20 09:53:30.042: Failed to observe node ready status change to false
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/network_partition.go:61
```

- this showed up as a failure during the v1.8.0 release (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/53018)
- the issue referenced therein was reopened and seems to have been failing ever since? (https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/issues/47820)

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a bug.
labels.name: kind/bug

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a consistently or frequently failing test.
labels.name: kind/failing-test

labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Apps.
labels.name: sig/apps

labels.description: Categorizes an issue or PR as relevant to SIG Node.
labels.name: sig/node

title: [e2e failure] [k8s.io] [sig-apps] Network Partition [Disruptive] [Slow] [k8s.io] Pods should return to running and ready state after network partition is healed All pods on the unreachable node should be marked as NotReady upon the node turn NotReady AND all pods should be mark back to Ready when the node get back to Ready before pod eviction timeout
